triples.name: Multi-agent system
triples.relevance: The paper addresses consensus tracking control for nonlinear multiagent systems.

triples.name: Consensus dynamics
triples.relevance: Consensus tracking is the core problem addressed in the paper for multiagent systems.

triples.name: Neural network (machine learning)
triples.relevance: Neural networks are used to approximate unknown nonlinear functions in the MAS.

triples.name: Backstepping
triples.relevance: Backstepping technique is employed as a control design method in the proposed scheme.

triples.name: Adaptive control
triples.relevance: Adaptive neural control is used to handle uncertain nonlinear system parameters.

triples.name: Directed graph
triples.relevance: Directed graphs model the communication topology between agents in the multiagent system.

triples.name: Nonlinear control
triples.relevance: Nonlinear control techniques address the challenge of controlling nonlinear multiagent systems.

triples.name: Lyapunov stability
triples.relevance: Lyapunov stability theory is used to analyze the finite-time stability of the closed-loop system.

triples.name: Event-driven architecture
triples.relevance: Event-triggered mechanism with dynamic threshold is a novel contribution to reduce network resource waste.
